name: Cyber Lover
description:
Description & How To Play

Cyber Lover is a game that describes a college girl's online date. Make choice for the distance unreliable relationship. different choices leads to different outcomes.

Players need to  make choice in game by pressing guided keys

players need to finish the game in 25 seconds so don't think for a single choice for too long

Anyway, it's very easy. Just Follow Your Heart!!!!
